thread.section_title: Hotel Victoire & Germain - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent and stay; would book again in a heartbeat
thread.title_full: Excellent location and stay; would book again in a heartbeat - Review of Hotel Victoire & Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ketrina H
title: Excellent and stay; would book again in a heartbeat
text:
The location is amazing; convenient to desired Paris sights. The room was comfy; nice bath. Shops, bars, restaurants galore. Friendly and helpful staff. Alexandra made us a last-minute reservations next door and gave us other great restaurant recommendations.
Room Tip: Stayed in room 348; chatter from people on the street below could be heard but it quieted down befor... See more room tips
